LocationWaitlistedParty.name: LocationWaitlistedParty
LocationWaitlistedParty.description: Represents a specific party of people waiting in a queue.

Description.description: A brief description of this queue.

EntryDateTime.description: The date and time a party is added to the queue.

EstimatedWaitHours.description: The estimated hours of wait time for a party.

EstimatedWaitMinutes.description: The estimated minutes of wait time for a party.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The date on which the record was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner for this record.

PartySize.description: The size of the queued party.

PartyStatus.description: The state of a party in the queue.

SignUpDateTime.description: The date and time when a party signed up for the queue.
